scripts.release-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/*
scripts.build: react-native bundle --platform android  --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi/ && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/raw/
scripts.bundleRelease: yarn release-build && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.APKRelease: yarn release-build && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.debug-build: yarn release-build && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug
